title: can't play
body: everytime i try loading into a game it just goes back to the client and says reconnect.

replies.body: This can happen if there's some instability or a block preventing your connection from reaching the game server.  The steps in the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide should help fix this, just be sure to test it in a custom game.
